channel.title: Pages on Guy James
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Guy James

item.title: About Me
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: Ruminations on GameB, P2P, collapse, regenerative cultures, Web3.0, psychedelics and music. Currently working with BEYØND DAO. In the past I have worked with the Cooperativa Integral Catalana - you can see me and others talking about it in the documentary Autogestió - also the Ecoxarxa Garrotxa, and FairCoop. For more details see the CV page. In my opinion humanity is approaching a threshold: we are in an extended process of birthing a new consciousness.

item.title: Contact
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: To get in touch send me an email at info [@] guyjames.com

item.title: Hire Me
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: Basic Male Born 1969 in the UK Currently living in the highest village in Spain (alt. 1678m), Valdelinares, in the Teruel region. My LinkedIn Profile Work/Affiliations I am one of the founders of the BEYØND DAO, working with artists to further the cause of consciousness research in Web3.0. This is my main current project along with The Elevator which is a nascent ‘consciousness accelerator’/think tank. I am currently producing a digest/newsletter on consciousness research for The Elevator in collaboration with the author Daniel Pinchbeck; it can be found at wearetheelevator.

item.title: Music
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: Click here to go to my BandCamp page I have more songs and info at my SoundCloud page and you can listen to the album and subscribe to updates at my Facebook Page Music, not for taking drugs to, but that is in itself a drug.
